DataElement.preferredName: Distant Metastatic Tumor Surgery Performed Year Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value that represents the year the distant metastatic tumor surgery was performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Metastatic Malignant Neoplasm Surgical Procedure Performed Date
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A malignant tumor that has spread from its original (primary) site of growth to another site close to or distant from the primary site._A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery._Executed and carried through to completion._The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A malignant tumor that has spread from its original (primary) site of growth to another site close to or distant from the primary site.

Concepts.definition: A malignant tumor that has spread from its original (primary) site of growth to another site close to or distant from the primary site.

Property.preferredDefinition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.:Executed and carried through to completion.:The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

Concepts.definition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.
Executed and carried through to completion.
The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Event; something that happens at a given place and time._The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days._Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Event; something that happens at a given place and time.:The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: Something that happens at a given place and time.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
